detail_desc: T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Pyjama set with a long-sleeved top, a short-sleeved top and bottoms in soft, organic cotton jersey. Tops with a ribbed neckline and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long earrings in hammered metal. Length 8 cm.
Trousers in stretch leather. Regular waist with concealed elastication, a visible zip in one side and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Gently flared, calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with a sheen. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers in twill made from a viscose blend. High waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front, a zip fly and button, and fake welt back pockets with a button. Wide, tapered legs with creases.
Metal earrings with plastic pendants. Length 8.5 cm.
T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Vest top in ribbed cotton jersey.
Three-strand thin metal chain necklace with different pendants. Adjustable length, 40-48.5 cm.
Knee-length shorts in printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and fake front pockets.
Blucher shoes in shiny leather with lacing at the top and gently rounded toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Mesh trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Paper bag trousers in a jacquard weave. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, and a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and straight-cut, wide legs with creases.
Poncho in a soft knit with decorative lacing at the top and a fringed hem.

Blouse in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and a wrapover front with a press-stud at the top. Long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem with a decorative bow.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons at the top and long sleeves.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in velvet made from a silk blend with a deep V-neck and an opening at the back with a concealed press-stud at the back of the neck. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, discreet side pockets and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder body in soft, ribbed jersey with decorative buttons at the top, short raglan sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and legs with decorative stitching and narrow hems.

Dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a detachable belt. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Small, sturdy handbag in imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top and a detachable metal chain shoulder strap. One inner compartment. Lined. Size 9x13x17.5 cm.
Cotton jersey T-shirt with a print motif.
Poncho in a soft knit containing some wool with open sides. Length at the front and back 80 cm.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a tie belt, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Pleats at the top, concealed pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and straight legs.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped side pockets, a mesh section at the crotch and wide ribbing at the hems.
Fitted jersey crêpe top in a narrow cut at the top with ties at the back of the neck. Lined.
Calf-length dress in an airy weave with a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and narrow tie. Deep V-neck, seam at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Sleeveless body in soft jersey made from a modal blend with a V-neck, seam at the waist and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with long, wide puff sleeves and covered buttons down the front. Ribbed trim around the neckline, down the button band and at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Hats in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a straight-cut hem. For the matching child’s T-shirt, look for 0721929.

Calf-length dress in lightly crinkled jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves with narrow elastication at the ends and an elasticated seam at the waist. Decorative buttons at the top and classic buttons on the skirt. Unlined.
V-neck top in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Lace-covered trim at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and covered buttons at the back.
Thin metal chain anklets, one in ball chain, one with metal beads and one with plastic and metal beads. Adjustable length 22-25.5 cm.
Elastic bracelets with beads made from semi-precious stones, wood and plastic.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with decorative beads on the front, a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The top has short sleeves and flares gently to the hem. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Satin top with a draped neckline and narrow, detachable shoulder straps in metal with sparkly stones. Double layer at the top.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elastication around the top.
Short-sleeved Henley shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, button placket and small fabric appliqué at the hem.
Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with a rib-knit stand-up collar and wide raglan sleeves with foldover ribbing at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Leather shoes with open lacing and a moccasin seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Bucket bag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top and one inner compartment. Size 12x28x30 cm.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a knot detail at the hem.
Vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with frill trims around the neckline and armholes.
Velour-covered hair elastic.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted dress in airy mesh with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves. Jersey inner dress with narrow shoulder straps.
Soft slippers with elastication around the opening and soft, imitation leather soles.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Waist belt in grained imitation leather with a round metal buckle. Width 2.7 cm.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Welt side pockets, stretch ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slim fit.
Jacquard-patterned socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey, one ribbed. Adjustable shoulder straps, removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide elastic hem. No fasteners.
Hoop earrings in various sizes. One pair in smooth metal and two pairs decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter 2.5 cm, 5 cm and 6 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with sparkly stones at the top, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs with cut-off, frayed hems.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a round neckline with narrow ribbing.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a fine knit with fringing. No fasteners.

Non-wired, push-up lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable, partially lace-covered shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with a text print. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs.
Jersey T-shirt.

Long dress in airy, patterned, lightly crinkled chiffon with a narrow stand-up collar, buttons at the top and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. V-neck, jersey inner dress with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.

Straight-style jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing glittery threads with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with narrow ribbing at the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Short skirt in sturdy cotton twill. High paper bag waist with wide, covered elastication, a zip fly and two buttons, and large flap patch pockets at the sides. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in an airy cotton weave with frill-trimmed smocking at the top and shoulder straps with sewn-on, decorative bows. Unlined.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, long sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit.
V-neck dress in an airy weave with short, double-flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and ties at the sides. Lined.
Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets, inner pockets and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.
Ankle-length treggings in sturdy jersey with fine details. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Joggers in a lightweight rustle weave with a wide elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a zipped back pocket and wide jersey ribbing at the hems.
